content: crochet pattern for a succulent in a flowerpot d i like plants so i tried to make a pattern for one i like i hope you have fun crocheting it i used a 3 mm hook and it came out to be about 6 cm in diameter and a little under 10 cm in height colors yarn needed white green pink yellow brown you can use a darker green for the pot and a lighter green for the succulent but it s not mandatory also a piece of cardboard
